data.title: Story Company
data.text: Gautam Godhwani is an entrepreneur and investor with 20+ years of experience in the technology industry. He is currently a partner at Green Era Capital which invests in early stage technology companies. Previously, he was Co-Founder & CEO of Simply Hired, a job search engine with 30 million monthly unique visitors. Simply Hired was acquired by Recruit Holdings in 2016. Before Simply Hired, he was Co-Founder & CEO of AtWeb, a Web tools company with one million small business customers, which was acquired by Netscape/AOL. Gautam also co-founded India Community Center, which operates several facilities in the San Francisco Bay Area, serving the community with 500+ programs and events annually. Gautam has previously held positions at Hewlett-Packard, IBM and Microsoft.
